# session
<br>

php static session class

<br>
<br>

use Session\Session;
<br>
# Set Session

<br>

Session::set($key,$value);

<br>

# Get session

<br>


Session::get($key);

<br>

# Session delete

<br>

Session::delete($key);

<br>

# Session flush

<br>

Session::flush();

<br>

# all display session

<br>
Session::display();
